name: .OMWADDON File Extension
summary: Learn about .OMWADDON files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: For instructions on how to install the mod an OMWADDON file contains, click here. Note that you must have already installed and set up OpenMW to use OMWADDON files.
You can also open an OMWADDON file with OpenMW-CS, the mod creation utility included with OpenMW, if you want to edit the data it contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
